short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitoring your favourite websites and API's

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trackit allows you to monitor any website or API. You can schedule HTTP requests to automatically get information about availability and latencies.
 
Whenever a website/API you are tracking fails, the plugin icon changes color so that you can take any action if required.
